thread.title: If you can book early and get the Eiffel view rooms it is worth it
thread.title_full: If you can book early and get the Eiffel view rooms it is worth it - Review of Hotel Duquesne Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Archaeobuff
title: If you can book early and get the Eiffel view rooms it is worth it
text: A satisfactory hotel, small, clean and modern. The Eiffel view from the window made it worthwhile, especially at night. Lacking character otherwise. Small rooms. Struggling to fill 200 words here - got there :).
